name: homeassistant
prelude:
"""
 For the Home Assistant integration to work, you need to write code to bind the Snips intents slots & values to Home Assistant components. This code will be copied by Sam to Hass' python_script folder
 Here is a template you can use :

<intent_slot_name> = data.get('<intent_slot_name>')
service_data = {'entity_id': '<intent_slot_name>' }
hass.services.call('<hass_component>', '<hass_component_method>', service_data, False)

Refer to the documentation for further details. 
https://snips.gitbook.io/documentation/console/actions/home-assistant
https://www.home-assistant.io/components/python_script/"""
